snippet.title: Birds Aren't Real - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
Check out this funny, chaotic trailer for Birds Aren’t Real, an action-stealth game with a comic twist, revealed during the Advanced Games Projects (AGP) Spotlight Show at USC Games Expo 2023.

As a government surveillance pigeon drone, you'll engage in missions, sneak around the city, and use your creative thinking to manipulate the townsfolk and dispel their suspicions about your TOTALLY not-real Avian Task Force
